var.name: communities
var.data: {:limit} SELECT community.name, community.area, possessionAddress.street, possessionAddress.houseNumber, possessionAddress.flatNumber, possession.area, possession.id FROM Community community JOIN community.possessions possession JOIN possession.address possessionAddress LEFT OUTER JOIN possession.people possessionOwnerPerson LEFT OUTER JOIN possession.companies possessionOwnerCompany LEFT OUTER JOIN possessionOwnerPerson.address personAddress LEFT OUTER JOIN possessionOwnerCompany.address companyAddress WHERE {:where}

var.name: countRows
var.data: {:single} SELECT count(community.name) FROM Community community JOIN community.possessions possession JOIN possession.address possessionAddress LEFT OUTER JOIN possession.people possessionOwnerPerson LEFT OUTER JOIN possession.companies possessionOwnerCompany LEFT OUTER JOIN possessionOwnerPerson.address personAddress LEFT OUTER JOIN possessionOwnerCompany.address companyAddress WHERE {:where}
